resources.string: The purpose is to optimize various extensions of ColorOS
Click to see the list of open source code
Allow the application to overwrite the installation of the old version directly in the case of installing a new version
Turn off signature verification when installing applications, you can install tampered applications
Allow direct override to install applications with different signatures for the same package name
Always use the signature of the installed app when installing
Not a general !hazard! Enable only when absolutely necessary
It can solve some internal integrity check of the app, generally do not need to open
!! All installers can overwrite installed apps!!! Please be careful when installing unknown installers
Please make sure Xposed API >= 93 and the module has the appropriate scope checked \\n If the above has been done, try to click OK to exit the app, and then try again
